body.name: Gillette Venus Intimate Grooming Womens Electric Razor, Bikini Trimmer for Pubic Hair and Skin, Includes 1 Womens Razor, 1 Comb, 1 AA Battery
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 mins
features: GENTLE HAIR REMOVAL: Lateral skin protection fins offer a gentle removal of hair in the pubic area
WET & DRY USAGE: Trimmer is designed to used in and out of the shower
FOR THICK HAIRS: Specifically designed to work with thick hair
DESIGNED IN GERMANY: Powered by Braun and designed in Germany
body.description: The Venus for Pubic Hair & Skin Gentle Trimmer is designed to complete the lineup of tools to offer all key methods women use to care for pubic hair and skin. The trimmer provides gentle hair removal with lateral skin protection fins and offers wet & dry usage. The trimmer also is designed to help protect pubic skin from hair tug and pull.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this device. Easy instructions and lovely product design. Fits in my hand comfortably and makes hair removal a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moves across sensitive areas well
reviews.reviewText: I had another style of the venus shaver previously and decided to give this style a try. The only think I do not like that hair gets stuck inside the shaving head. I do not know how to clean it out very well and is slowed down the shaving process having to empty out the shaver head frequently. It caught every tiny hair in the corners of the shaving head. Easy glide over skin and did not cause irritation or cuts. But a bit more high maintenance for cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's great...for a little while
reviews.reviewText: I totally fell in love with this trimmer, it was easy to use for a great price. I did knick myself a few times, but usually chalked it up to user error. Unfortunately, I also noticed it was very difficult to clean after use. The top compartment only opens slightly, so hair would clog it up. Within 10-12 months I started noticing rust and it eventually died (after several new battery attempts). I'm currently looking to replace it but don't plan to buy this one again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the hedges trimmed
reviews.reviewText: If you like to keep the hedges neat and trimmed this is a great inexpensive way to do so. The comb is a great way to keep it at that certain length. If you have those stubborn hairs that you just missed with a razor. You can take the comb off and cut those stubborn weeds down. No one will ever know. It works great for that. If you like everything clean and smooth. This will not do it on its own, sorry it takes a little more effort. It will leave very short stubble. It's a trimmers doing what it is designed to do. Why do some people want to blame the trimmer? It's not the trimmers fault. You still need a razor. Sorry folks. That's life. I hope you enjoyed reading this. On a serious note. I do highly recommend this, as an inexpensive way to clean up or to get it done quick and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars REALLY great ... Except 🙄
reviews.reviewText: Okay, so, this is a great tool to have in your hair-maintenance arsenal. The trimmer is terrific. Works well, and no pinches or painful grabs. HOWEVER, who the 🤬 decided to create a waterproof device that can be kept in a damp location, like the shower, and yet designed an on/off mechanism that is completely smooth--no grips, ridges, silicone? It's nearly impossible to turn on/off in the shower without grabbing a towel and drying the device AND hands. What the .... !?!? Come on, people, step it up with the design sitch. Meanwhile, IF you do buy it (and you should, nonetheless, because it does what is is supposed to do), grab a rubber band or two, maybe a hair tie, and wrap them tightly around the base for a handhold. Voila! Problem semi-solved.

reviews.reviewTitle: Small, discreet, easy to use, but not a quick shave--be patient
reviews.reviewText: I like how small this thing is. I doubted it when I opened the package, but while trying to shave one's bush down under, it is comforting and convenient to not be handling a bulky device.The added clip is great for cutting to a common length for folks who still want to see/feel some hair--but be patient, as I found this required a few passes. Removing the clip and shaving down to skin was faster, I did not feel any tugging or nicks, and it was very easy and intuitive. I haven't tried this in the shower yet, but it is advertised as being made for that--I recommend that path instead of making a mess everywhere like a barber shop floor.Read the instructions for how to clean the shaver head, that is the only part not intuitive. Also, the instructions seem to indicate you need to oil the blade after washing, but there's no oil included in my box, so... contemplate where to get some.

Excelente compra, vale la pena. Es fácil de usar, practico y muy cómodo, los resultados son excelentes y no hay irritación. Se puede quitar vello de las axilas, pecho y partes íntimas. Un producto excelente. Muy recomendable
This is an amazing little razor, it lives up to the statement that it doesn't pull hair which is very important especially in sensitive areas

reviews.reviewTitle: Dejo de servir la segunda vez que la quise usar!
reviews.reviewText: Así como dice el título: la compré, puse batería, la usé y bien.. pero la siguiente vez que la quise usar: nada. Muerta. Le cambié la batería: muerta. No desperdicien su dinero.
Great quality, delivered on time and as promised.
